greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of disconnected 4-regular simple graphs on n vertices with girth exactly 4.
comment: Only one component need have girth exactly four; the other components need only have girth at least four.
First differs from A185244 at n = 38, the smallest n where A185245 is nonzero.
link: Jason Kimberley, Index of sequences counting disconnected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g
xref: Disconnected 4-regular simple graphs with girth exactly g: A185043 (g=3),  this sequence (g=4).
Disconnected k-regular simple graphs with girth exactly 4: A185034 (k=3),  this sequence (k=4).
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 04 2011
ext: a(31) corrected by the author, propagated from A185244, Jan 05 2013
